title: Journey to Them
description: Journey Stephenson's only dream was to compete in gymnastics at the college level. Her entire life has been dedicated to training for that dream. But someone doesn't want her to achieve her goal. Luckily, she has her childhood crush and his friends to watch out for her and take care of her. The relationships that develop are far more than she ever thought possible. Can she stay safe from a crazy stalker, juggle three sexy men and attain her lifelong goal?
author: Ryann Elizabeth
